TopicTitle: Adventures of a SPH loving player

Articles.Content:
I'm always excited to make new planes/rovers in the SPH, so when the time comes, I make ALOT of experimental prototypes.

I already posted a thread on my best shuttle, the SRPS Eagle. Ill show you pics here.

SRPS Eagle around Sentar (PlanetFactory)

I've decided to set aside plans for the SRPS and instead work on a VTOL

I've managed to design a VTOL with rotatable engines.Since it is a prototype, I called it the Proto-VTOL1 (P-V1 for short)

PV-1 on the runway

Activated the engines, taking off vertically

Rotating engines for horizontal travel

I travel around for a bit, testing to see how sturdy it is, and then after a bit, I safely splash down in the sea

Ill post more projects soon, but until then feel free to share yours! Im also open to suggestions on future projects!
